text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
If I eat snacks for too long, I won't 
be able to eat dinner……

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
But it's ok if it's juuust for a little bit. 
Which means ——

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I just have have to eat quickly! 
I'll only be eating for a second so it's ok!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Okay, here I go! Full Turbo!
